segment: In the country of Karnes,  Look what has happened;  The Major Sheriff died, Leaving Román badly wounded.
He struck out for Gonzales Without showing any fear, “Follow me, cowardly rangers,  I am Gregorio Cortez.”
Gregorio Cortez went out,  He went towards Laredo They decided not to follow  Because they were afraid of him.
Over by El Encinal,  According to what we hear,  They made him a corral,  And he killed them another sheriff.
